definition: A male sibling, typically used to refer to a person who shares at least one biological or legal parent with another person. This term is commonly used in familial contexts to denote a brotherly relationship.

examples.german: Ich habe zwei Brüder und eine Schwester.
examples.english: I have two brothers and one sister.
My brother likes to play soccer.

examples.german: Ich habe meinen Bruder lange nicht gesehen.
examples.english: I haven't seen my brother in a long time.
